images.description: SDSS image of lenticular galaxy IC 3481 and spiral galaxy PGC 41646, which are part of Arp 175, which is also known as Zwicky's Triplet
SDSS image of Arp 175 (also known as Zwicky's Triplet), consisting of lenticular galaxy IC 3481 and spiral galaxies IC 3483 and PGC 41646
SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy IC 3481 and spiral galaxy PGC 41646, also showing spiral galaxy IC 3483, with which they comprise Arp 175, which is also known as Zwicky's Triplet
